Trying not to perish

2018

Grohmann, C.H., 2018. Evaluation of TanDEM-X DEMs on selected Brazilian sites: comparison with SRTM, ASTER GDEM and ALOS AW3D30. Remote Sensing of Environment, 212C:121-133.
https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2018.04.043
Preprint available at arXiv:1709.05016 [physics.geo-ph] (open access)

Grohmann, C.H.; Viana, C.D.; Busarello, M.T.S.; Garcia, G.P.B., 2018. Structural analysis of clastic dikes based on Structure from Motion/Multi-View Stereo. Geomorphometry 2018 Conference. Boulder, CO.
